text: Averdoingt is a commune in the Pas-de-Calais department in northern France. ==Geography== A small farming village located 19 miles (30 km) west of Arras at the junction of the D81 and D81E roads. ==Population== ==Sights== * The ruins of a 12th-century castle. * The church of St. Leger, dating from the thirteenth century. ==See also== *Communes of the Pas-de-Calais department ==References== * INSEE commune file Category:Communes of Pas-de-Calais
title: Averdoingt
